about_the_game:
Electronic Universe is a complete electronic musical shooter game.
The worlds were designed to fit with the electronic music created specifically for the game.
- 3 Levels of difficulty (Easy, Medium, Hard).
- 6 Fantasy Musical Worlds.
- Shoot the obstacles to keep going on the game levels.
- Use your powers to destroy more obstacles at the same time.
- Enjoy electronic music and rythmic decorations of the game.

The game play is simple, you have two pistols (one of each Hand),
and you have counted bullets, if you are on easy mode you will
have more bullets than if you are playing on Medium or Hard
difficulty level.
The camera moves automatically around the level,
and you should pay atention to not hit the obstacles,
you should shoot them to destroy them and keep going
over the level.
There are powers that you can pick on some levels to be
more powerfull.

name: Electronic Universe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960, AMD Raedon R9 290
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR. Standing Only

short_description: Prepare yourself to shoot obstacles across a electronic musical game.
